attributes.action: Iain Duncan Smith to prove that he can live on £53 per week
attributes.additional_details:
We call for Iain Duncan Smith to prove that he can live on either £7.57 a day or £53 per week.  He apparently does not live in the real world because this amount has to cover gas, electricity, council tax, food and clothing plus run a car as well.

This just goes to prove that he is not in the real world.
